document_data.caption: A map showing the Codsrun Creek in Myrloch Vale.
document_data.name: Codsrun Creek
document_data.mainbody: The '''Codsrun Creek''' was a small river found on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The river originated from the [[Shee Pool]] just north of the [[Myrloch]]. It flowed northeast from the lake through the western [[Winterglen]] before passing through the [[Codsbay Mire]] to reach the [[Codsbay]] and the [[Strait of Oman]] in northern Gwynneth. An unnamed tributary from the foothills north of the [[Cambro Mountains]] joined the Codsrun Creek before it entered the Winterglen.
